templateData.kat:
The Parrot Pet can have its rarity upgraded from {{Epic}} all the way up to {{Legendary}} by Kat. When upgrading [[Pets]] through Kat the pet will keep all of its Pet Experience. However due to the scaling EXP needed the pet will lose some [[Pets#Leveling|Pet Levels]] depending on the new rarity. Kat will reduce the amount of {{Coins}} needed per level of the Pet. This discount is {{color|green|0.3%}} per level of the base price. {{Kat Cost |cost_epic_level_1 = {{Coins|15,000,000}}
16 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_feather.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Feather]] [[Enchanted Feather]] |cost_epic_level_100 = {{Coins|10,500,000}}
16 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_feather.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Feather]] [[Enchanted Feather]] |time_epic = 10 Days }}
